markdown:
## Explore our endpoints

Power your applications with our comprehensive scraping API

[**Scrape**\\
\\
Get llm-ready data from websites. Markdown, JSON, screenshot, etc.](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/features/scrape) [**Search**\\
\\
Search the web and get full content from results.](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/features/search) [**Crawl**\\
\\
Crawl all the pages on a website and get data for each page.](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/features/crawl) [**Agent** \\
\\
NEW\\
\\
Gather data wherever it lives on the web.](https://firecrawl.dev/app/agent)

### Scraped pages - Last 7 days

Credit usage differs

135

01/2301/2601/30

### Concurrent Browsers\[ LIVE \]

\# of active browsers — [upgrade plan](https://www.firecrawl.dev/pricing) for faster scraping

1

of 2 active browsers

[**API Key** \\
\\
Start scraping right away](https://www.firecrawl.dev/app/api-keys)

fc-f\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*bdba

[**MCP Integration** \\
\\
Connect with AI tools](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/mcp-server)

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "firecrawl-mcp": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "firecrawl-mcp"],
      "env": {
        "FIRECRAWL_API_KEY": "$API_KEY"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Integrations

\\
**Python**](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/sdks/python) [![JS/TS SDK](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fjs.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**JS/TS SDK**](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/sdks/node) [![Langchain](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Flangchain.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Langchain**](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/integrations/providers/firecrawl) [![Langchain JS](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Flangchain.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Langchain JS**](https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/document_loaders/web_loaders/firecrawl) [![LlamaIndex](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fllamaindex.jpeg&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**LlamaIndex**](https://developers.llamaindex.ai/python/framework-api-reference/readers/web/#llama_index.readers.web.FireCrawlWebReader) [![Zapier](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fzapier-square-logo.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Zapier**](https://zapier.com/apps/firecrawl/integrations) [![Make](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fmake.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Make**](https://www.make.com/en/integrations/firecrawl) [![Discord](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fdiscord.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Discord**](https://github.com/firecrawl/firecrawl-discord-bot) [![CrewAI](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fcrewai.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**CrewAI**](https://docs.crewai.com/en/tools/web-scraping/firecrawlscrapewebsitetool) [![Dify](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Flogos%2Fdify.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Dify**](https://dify.ai/blog/dify-ai-blog-integrated-with-firecrawl) [![Flowise](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fflowise.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Flowise**](https://docs.flowiseai.com/integrations/langchain/document-loaders/firecrawl) [![Pipedream](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fpipedream.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Pipedream**](https://pipedream.com/apps/firecrawl/) [![n8n](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fn8n.webp&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**n8n**](https://n8n.io/integrations/firecrawl/) [![Composio](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fcomposio.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\

\\

\\

\\

\\

\\

\\
**Pabbly Connect**](https://www.pabbly.com/connect/integrations/firecrawl/) [![Abstra](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fabstra.jpeg&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**Abstra**](https://www.abstra.io/integrations/firecrawl) [![ViaSocket](https://www.firecrawl.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fintegrations%2Fviasocket.png&w=48&q=75&dpl=dpl_5gNZ9ouDztZzBcXWoPJMLfyw3i3u)\\
\\
**ViaSocket**](https://viasocket.com/faq/integration-guides/getting-started---firecrawl?source=firecrawl)

## Example Projects

[**30+ Examples**\\
\\
Collection of simple projects built with Firecrawl\\
\\
TypeScriptPythonFirecrawl SDK](https://github.com/firecrawl/firecrawl/tree/main/examples) [**LLMs.txt Generator**\\
\\
Generate an llms.txt with this web app built on Next.js\\
\\
TypeScriptNext.jsFirecrawl SDK](https://github.com/firecrawl/llmstxt-generator) [**Trend Finder**\\
\\
Stay on top of trending topics on the web with AI\\
\\
TypeScriptFirecrawl SDK](https://github.com/ericciarla/trendFinder) [**Open Deep Research**\\
\\
Open source version of OpenAI's Deep Research\\
\\
Next.jsAI SDKFirecrawl SDK](https://github.com/nickscamara/open-deep-research) [**Full App Examples**\\
\\
Full Firecrawl apps with source code and instructions\\
\\
PythonTypescriptFirecrawl SDK](https://github.com/firecrawl/firecrawl-app-examples)

What's New

### Introducing the Firecrawl Skill & CLI

A new way for AI agents to reliably access real-time web data with a single install.

[Powered by Pylon](https://usepylon.com/)
